titles.title: Recognizing the 125th anniversary of the city of Billings, Montana.
Recognizing the 125th anniversary of the city of Billings, Montana.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Congratulates the city of Billings, Montana, and its residents for their contributions to the economic, social, and cultural development of the United States on the occasion of the quasquicentennial of the founding of the city.
